I finished this game's campaign within seconds, do you know why? because there wasn't one. I could not be bothered with the multiplayer because I knew it was going to be exactly like Counter-Strike, sone.And somehow this game was worse than the previous one. I would only recommend getting this game in the valve bundle because that is one of the most essential things on steam. plus Valve made it and they also made half-life wich is a review for another time.
